    • Method Detail

      • getUserAvatar

        java.lang.String getUserAvatar​(int userId)
        Returns details about a specified user's avatar. https://avatar.roblox.com/docs#!/Avatar/get_v1_users_userId_avatar
        Parameters:
        userId - integer
        Returns:
        { "scales": { "height": 0, "width": 0, "head": 0, "depth": 0, "proportion": 0, "bodyType": 0 }, "playerAvatarType": "R6", "bodyColors": { "headColorId": 0, "torsoColorId": 0, "rightArmColorId": 0, "leftArmColorId": 0, "rightLegColorId": 0, "leftLegColorId": 0 }, "assets": [ { "id": 0, "name": "string", "assetType": { "id": 0, "name": "string" } } ], "defaultShirtApplied": true, "defaultPantsApplied": true }

      • getUserCurrentlyWearing

        java.lang.String getUserCurrentlyWearing​(int UserId)
        Gets a list of asset ids that the user is currently wearing https://avatar.roblox.com/docs#!/Avatar/get_v1_users_userId_currently_wearing
        Parameters:
        UserId - The user Id
        Returns:
        { "assetIds": [ 0 ] }

      • getUserOutfit

        java.lang.String getUserOutfit​(int UserId,
                               int page,
                               int itemsPerPage)
        Gets a list of outfits for the specified user https://avatar.roblox.com/docs#!/Avatar/get_v1_users_userId_outfits
        Parameters:
        UserId - The user id
        page - The page number
        itemsPerPage - The max number of outfits that can be returned
        Returns:
        { "data": [ { "id": 0, "name": "string", "isEditable": true } ], "total": 0 }
